page.title: 03Lostock Hall and Farington
page.content: The area is South of Preston, in South Ribble in Central Lancashire. The main part agriculural with only one-sixth built up. Communications in the area are excellent. The M6 cuts across it and other major roads lead to Preston, Wigan, Southport, and Blackburn The main London to Glasgow railway line also crosses the area with a local line serving the population. The built up areas are mainly houses with a small num factories but the majority of the people travel outside the area to work Local employers include Leyland Motors,Baxi Heaters, and British Rail. The surrounding countryside is agricultural with many market gardens. Farington os an area 6km2 to the north of Leyland. It is predominately industrial with old Victorian Houses as well as newer estates
